// 主页 import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { SearchOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { Switch } from 'antd'; import '../../assets/css/homepage.css' import iphone from '../../assets/images/iphone.png' import electricity from '../../assets/images/电量.png' import wifi from '../../assets/images/wifi.png' import search from '../../assets/images/搜索.png' import brightness from '../../assets/images/控制.png' import launchpad from '../../assets/images/launchpad.png' import bear from '../../assets/images/bear.png' import vscode from '../../assets/images/vscode.png' import facetime from '../../assets/images/facetime.png' import safari from '../../assets/images/safari.png' import terminal from '../../assets/images/terminal.png' import mail from '../../assets/images/mail.png' import github from '../../assets/images/github.png' function Lockscreen(props) { var myDate = new Date() var time = myDate.toLocaleString() const [click, setClick] = useState('false') const [display, setDisplay] = useState('none') const [mytime, setMytime] = useState(time) const OpenPopUpWindow = (e) => { // console.log(e.currentTarget); let target = e.currentTarget //获取到当前触发事件的对象 // console.log(target.getAttribute('click')); let targetclick = target.getAttribute('click') if (targetclick==='false') { setClick('true') setDisplay('block') // console.log('已打开弹窗') } else { setClick('false') setDisplay('none') // console.log('已关闭弹窗') } } const ReturnLockScreen = () => { props.history.push('/') } useEffect(() => { setInterval(function () { // console.log('ok'); let timenow = new Date().toLocaleString() setMytime(timenow) },1000) }, []) const onChange = (checked) => { console.log({checked}); } // let checked = document.getElementsByClassName('Switch')[0].aria-checked // console.log(checked); return (
{OpenPopUpWindow(e)}} click={click} >
Bear

) } export default Lockscreen
